name: WP Subscription Forms – Subscription Form Plugin for WordPress
author: WP Shuffle

sections.description:
WP Subscription Forms The ultimate tool for creating stunning subscription forms. With WP Subscription Forms WordPress plugin you can start collecting the subscribers directly in the WordPress Backend. You can also export the subscribers to CSV.

üåü Unlimited Subscription Forms: Create as many forms as you need, customized to your unique requirements.

üé® 10 Stunning Templates: Choose from a selection of professionally designed form templates that enhance your site’s visual appeal.

üîê Double Opt-In Verification: Build trust with your audience using double opt-in functionality, ensuring the authenticity of your subscribers.

üí• Popup Forms: Engage visitors with eye-catching popup subscription forms that convert like never before.

üîß Customize Every Component: Tailor your forms by enabling or disabling specific components, giving you full control over the user experience.

üöÄ Ajax Form Submission: Provide a seamless, responsive form submission process for your users, boosting your website’s interactivity.

üìä Export Subscribers: Easily manage your subscriber list by exporting data to a CSV file for further analysis and outreach.

üëÅÔ∏è Backend Form Preview: Preview your subscription forms from the backend to fine-tune them to perfection.

‚ÜîÔ∏è RTL Compatible: Reach a global audience with RTL (right-to-left) language support.

üåç Translation Ready: Seamlessly localize your subscription forms to cater to international users.

üì± Mobile Friendly: Ensure an excellent user experience on all devices, from smartphones to desktops.

üåê Browser Compatibility: Our plugin works flawlessly on all browsers, ensuring a consistent experience for every user.

Check Premium Features

  • Create Unlimited Form with different restrictions
  • 30+ Pre Designed Subscription Form Templates
  • Show popup form with delay on individual page
  • Show forms as Floating to bottom right or bottom left of your web page
  • Custom Form Styler Available
  • Mailchimp, MailerLite, Sendinblue and Constant Contact Integration available
  • And many more …

Check all premium features here

Check compatible themes here

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-subscription-forms directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WP Subscription Forms from the admin menu to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Can I create mutiple forms?

Yes, you can.

Do I need to design the forms?

No you won’t need to design the forms because our plugin already have 10 beautiful pre designed templates from which you can choose one.

short_description: Create unlimited subscription forms effortlessly with our user-friendly tool. Collect subscribers directly in WP Backend and export them to CSV.
